page.title: 08RIDING FROM ROTHLEY
page.content: Every Saturday at 3:00 p.m.I go to have riding lessons.I go to Rempston ,which is about 12 miles off, so we leave at about 2.3O.I go with my sister ,Sharon,and two friends Jane and Charlotte.I used to go to a riding school but they did not really teach you much,except for your jumping position,and how to make your pony go,turn,and things like that. Sometimes we did a bit of cantering, { Rempston}is far better ,for they only ever allow 8 in a lesson,and our lesson usually has 4 or 5.They teach you exactly how to do things, including how to lengthen or shorten stirrups.This costs Â£3.5O.In Rothley , the Livery Stables is called{The Paddocks}.They have 11 stalls.They look after other peoples horses which are exercised in pairs.
